Package org.modelio.gproject.gproject

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IProjectFactory
    Interface that all project factories must implement.
    IProjectMonitor
    GProject event handler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GProject
    Represents a Modelio project.
    GProjectConfigurer
    Reconfigure an opened project with a new project descriptor.
    GProjectConfigurer.Failure
    Represents the failure of a module operation.
    GProjectCreator
    Builds a new empty project in a directory.
    GProjectEvent
    Event in the GProject life cycle.
    GProjectFactory
    Factory that instantiates a GProject from a File path.
    GProjectMonitorSupport
    Manages project event listeners.
    ProjectWriter
    Serialize a GProject, a IProjectFragment or a project descriptor in a XML file.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GProjectEventType
    Project event type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FragmentConflictException
    Indicates that the project already contain a fragment with the same identifier or URI.
    GProjectAuthenticationException
    Exception thrown when opening a project fails because of some authentication issue.
    GProjectLockedException
    Indicates the project is already open in another (or same) Modelio instance.
